name: @majority-protocol/spin-wheel
description: Daily spin wheel mini-game for Majority apps

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external react --external react-native --external react-native-reanimated --external react-native-svg --external tamagui
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external react --external react-native --external react-native-reanimated --external react-native-svg --external tamagui --watch

author: Majority Protocol
